channel.title: Harper War Weownthesun on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: w00t hehe. we rule
item.description: so the kids who brought you weownthesun.com have completed another site toward world domination. soo.. check out our new site: http://www.falaphilia.com. we rule. so far we have received a bunch of emails and gotten coverage on boingboing. I am excited. stay tuned for my new site: the story of harper!
